text: Tumu honjesheje imigisha yacu munyuma y’ingorane zamushikiye mumwanya aca avuga ati:- ibi vyose birankwiye jewe kandi sinizeye yuko umuhero w’Isi uzoboneka kandi ninasubizwa ku Muremyi wanje, ntankeka ndafise ivyiza vyanje kuriyo, rero natwe tuzoba menyesha abo bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri kuri ivyo bagize kandi tuba honjeshe ibihano bikomeye cane
